mapper.select: select a.id,a.stor_no,a.datetime,a.weight,a.materials,a.meminfo,a.edit_user_id2,a.edit_datetime2,a.delete_state,a.max_weight,a.tiji,b.stones_name as stonesName,usr.u_name from wh_warehouse_count as a left join dic_stones b on a.materials=b.id LEFT JOIN u_user usr ON a.edit_user_id2 = usr.user_id and usr.delete_state = 1 where a.delete_state=1

select a.id,a.stor_no,a.datetime,a.weight,a.materials,a.meminfo,a.edit_user_id2,a.edit_datetime2,a.delete_state,b.material_name as materialsName from wh_warehouse_count as a left join dic_materials b on a.materials=b.id where a.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update wh_warehouse_count set stor_no=#{wwc.storNo}, datetime=#{wwc.datetime}, weight=#{wwc.weight}, materials=#{wwc.materials}, meminfo=#{wwc.meminfo}, edit_user_id2=#{wwc.editUserId2}, edit_datetime2=#{wwc.editDatetime2}, tiji=#{wwc.tiji}, max_weight=#{wwc.maxWeight} where id=#{wwc.id}
update wh_warehouse_count set delete_state=0 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select top 1 a.id,a.stor_no,a.datetime,a.weight,a.materials,a.meminfo,a.edit_user_id2,a.edit_datetime2,a.delete_state,b.material_name as materialsName,usr.u_name from wh_warehouse_count as a left join dic_materials b on a.materials=b.id LEFT JOIN u_user usr ON a.edit_user_id2 = usr.user_id and usr.delete_state = 1 where a.delete_state=1 and a.stor_no=#{storNo}

SELECT a.*,CASE WHEN b.dayWeightIn is null THEN 0 ELSE b.dayWeightIn end as dayWeightIn ,CASE WHEN b.dayWeightIn is null THEN 0 ELSE b.dayWeightIn-a.dayWeightOut end as dayWeightCha FROM (SELECT top 7 SUM(weight) dayWeightOut,convert(char(10),production_time ,120) dayTimeOut FROM quality_by_plate_real_time_prodocution_data GROUP BY convert(char(10),production_time ,120) ORDER BY convert(char(10),production_time ,120) desc) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(weight) dayWeightIn,convert(char(10),datetime ,120) dayTimeIn FROM wh_incoming_material GROUP BY convert(char(10),datetime ,120)) b on a.dayTimeOut = b.dayTimeIn ORDER BY a.dayTimeOut ASC
